Title: Murder on a Sunday Morning
Actors: Ann Finnell, Patrick McGuinness, James Williams, Michael Glover
Plot: On May 7, 2000, in the parking lot of the Ramada Inn in Jacksonville, Florida, 65-year-old Mary Ann Stephens is shot in the head before her husband's eyes. Ninety minutes later, 15-year-old Brenton Butler is arrested. For the investigators and the media it's just another messed-up youth, just another wasted life.
